sourcesContent: import { ViewIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons'; import { IconButton, Modal, ModalContent, ModalOverlay, useDisclosure } from '@chakra-ui/react' import React from 'react' const ProfileModal = ({user, children}) => { const {isOpen, onOpen, onClose} = useDisclosure(); return <> {children ? ({children}) : ( } onClick={onOpen}/> )} Modal Title ; } export default ProfileModal;
